PageTitle: display bgp unnumbered peer interface log-info
FuncDef: The display bgp unnumbered peer interface log-info command displays log information about unnumbered BGP peers. The display bgp unnumbered peer interface log-info command displays log information about unnumbered BGP peers.
CLIs: display bgp unnumbered peer interface { <interface-name> | <IfType> <IFNum> } log-info

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp unnumbered peer interface 100GE1/0/1 log-info
ExtraInfo: The display bgp unnumbered peer interface log-info command displays log information about unnumbered BGP peers.
